actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to require eligible applicants to hire veterans in connection with filling transitional public service jobs.

summary.text: Stipulates, under the provisions of the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act, that eligible applicants for funding shall hire veterans in connection with filling transistional public service jobs, on a ratio set forth in this Act. Stipulates that those veterans to be hired under this Act shall have been discharged from active duty under conditions other than dishonorable.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Comprehensive Employment and Training Act of 1973 to require eligible applicants to hire veterans in connection with filling transitional public service jobs.
